conbody.p: This action removes the license associated with a registered machine ID. This license is then available to be attributed again. The User who had their machine ID removed from the registered machine ID list can still use the free Katalon product.

li.p: Go to the License Management page.
Scroll down to the Registered Machines section.
Click on the Trash bin icon of the machine ID you want to remove.
The Deactivate Machine box pops up.
Click Remove to confirm your action.

ul.li: You can also remove machine IDs associated with a Licensed User by following this guide: Remove Licensed Users.
